name: Realty Mole Property
description: Get instant access to 140+ million property records, owner details, home value and rent estimates, active listings and rental market statistics with the Realty Mole real estate data API. Available nationwide in the US.

api_methods.name: Property Rental Listings
api_methods.description: Search for rental listings in a geographical area or around a specific location. Returns the listed rent, date, property features, and other listing information. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The two-character state abbreviation, used to search for listings in a specific state

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current listing status, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Active`, `Inactive`

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since a property was listed on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: The 5-digit zip code, used to search for listings in a specific zip code

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms, used to search for listings matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the property, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of listings to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the search area, in kilometers. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first listing to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The name of the city, used to search for listings in a specific city

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for listings in a specific area

api_methods.name: Property Rental Listing by Id
api_methods.description: Returns a single property rental listing matching the specified id, if it exists. Property ids can be obtained via the `/properties`, `/saleListings` or `/rentalListings` endpoints. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: propertyId
parameters.description: The id of the property listing to return

parameters.name: propertyId

api_methods.name: Property Records
api_methods.description: Search for property records in a geographical area, or around a specific address. Returns the property features, owner details, tax assessment, and other property information. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property, used to search for properties matching this criteria. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`, `Land`

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first property record to return, used to paginate through large lists of results. Defaults to 0 if not provided

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The name of the city, used to search for properties in a specific city

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The 2-character state abbreviation, used to search for properties in a specific state

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of property records to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 50 if not provided

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: The 5-digit zip code, used to search for properties in a specific zip code

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms, used to search for properties matching this criteria

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the search area. Use the `latitude`/`longitude` and `radius` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address of the property, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. Used to retrieve data for a specific property, or together with the `radius` parameter to search for properties in a specific area
parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Dr, San Antonio, TX, 78244

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The radius of the search area, in kilometers. Use in combination with the `latitude`/`longitude` or `address` parameters to search for properties in a specific area

api_methods.name: Property Rent Estimate
api_methods.description: Returns a rent estimate and comparable rental listings for an address or lat/long coordinate. Providing property feature parameters will improve the estimate accuracy. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: squareFootage
parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The property address, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244

parameters.name: maxRadius
parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in kilometers. Defaults to 50 if not provided

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: compCount
parameters.description: The number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

utterances.utterance: What is the rent estimate for a 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-family home at 123 Main St, Springfield, IL, 62704?

What is the rent estimate for a 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-family home at 123 Main St, Springfield, IL, 62704, with comparable listings within 10 kilometers?
Can you provide a rent estimate for a condo with 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms located at 45 Elm St, Boston, MA, 02110, with comparable listings from the last 30 days?
Find the rent estimate for a townhouse with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms at 789 Oak Ave, Austin, TX, 73301, with 15 comparable listings.

api_methods.name: Random Property Records
api_methods.description: Returns a list of property records selected at random up to the specified limit, to facilitate applications requiring samples of randomly selected property data. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return, between 1 and 500. Defaults to 10 if not provided

utterances.utterance: Can you fetch 20 random property records?
I need a sample of 50 random property records.
Please retrieve 10 random property records for me.
Get me 100 random property records.
I'd like to see 5 random property records.
Fetch 30 random property records for my analysis.
Can you provide 15 random property records?
I need 200 random property records for a project.
Please get me 40 random property records.
Retrieve 500 random property records for a comprehensive study.

api_methods.name: Rental Market Data
api_methods.description: Returns rental data for a single US zip code, including rent averages, rental listing composition, and historical rent trends. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: A valid 5-digit US zip code

utterances.utterance: What is the rental market data for zip code 90210?
Can you provide rental statistics for the area with zip code 10001?
I need information on rental trends in zip code 30301.
Show me the average rent prices in zip code 60614.
Get the rental market data for zip code 75201.
What are the rental listing details for zip code 94107?
Provide historical rent trends for zip code 20001.
I want to see the rental market statistics for zip code 33101.
Can you fetch the rental data for zip code 90001?
What is the rental composition in zip code 77002?

api_methods.name: Property Value Estimate
api_methods.description: Returns a property value estimate and comparable sale listings for an address or lat/long coordinate. Providing property feature parameters will improve the estimate accuracy. [More info.](https://rapidapi.com/realtymole/api/realty-mole-property-api/details)

parameters.name: bedrooms
parameters.description: The number of bedrooms in the property

parameters.name: daysOld
parameters.description: The maximum number of days since comparable listings were last seen on the market, with a minimum of 1

parameters.name: bathrooms
parameters.description: The number of bathrooms in the property. Supports fractions to indicate partial bathrooms

parameters.name: maxRadius
parameters.description: The maximum distance between comparable listings and the subject property, in kilometers. Defaults to 50 if not provided

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: squareFootage
parameters.description: The total living area size of the property, in square feet

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: The type of the property. Supported values are: `Single Family`, `Condo`, `Townhouse`, `Manufactured`, `Duplex-Triplex`, `Apartment`, `Land`

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the property. The `latitude`/`longitude` can be provided instead of the `address` parameter

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The property address, in the format of 'Street, City, State, Zip'. You need to provide either the `address` or the `latitude`/`longitude` parameters
parameters.default: 5500 Grand Lake Drive, San Antonio, TX, 78244

parameters.name: compCount
parameters.description: The number of comparable listings returned by the API, between 5 and 25. Defaults to 10 if not provided
